name: [LD33] Dungeon Master
description:
This is my first ever LD entry! WOW I have come a long way since then. The game is pretty unplayable, but I needed to post it for posterity.

Old LD Jam Data:

"Dungeon Master is a game where the player designs dungeons to kill the hero. It may feel a bit like a tower defense game, but more dungeony!"
